What is React Native?

React Native is a complete framework for building mobile apps and reacting to native cross Platforms. React Native is the finest technology to create an application for both iOS and Android.

The codebase may be reduced by roughly 95%, saving you time and money. It has several open-source libraries with pre-construction components and therefore accelerates the development process.

React Native apps have been designed with strong and state-of-the-art technology to enable companies around the world to reach new clients on mobile platforms.

Native application

Native applications are installed in an app store. They are particularly built for one platform and can use all smartphone capabilities, like the camera, GPS, speed meter, compass, contact list, etc.

React Native is better than Native?

React native is better and unique because it has

  • Lower the development time
  • Easy for Web developers 
  • Cost-effective 

Native 

  • High development time

Development Time

In a native application, you need two distinct teams to make your application available on both platforms, i.e. the Android development team and the iOS development team. This includes additional effort and time to create a mobile app.

In React Native’s instance, the same developer writes a single code for both platforms, which implies that React native applications may be created for Android and iOS using the same codes.

Mobile App Cost

The response to the cost of developing the mobile app also helps to find the suitable technology for the creation of your mobile app. The app creation using React Native is the top mobile app development firm, but the cost of Native App Development for the same app project may be reduced by 30%-35% in comparison.

Scalability

It offers mobile app developers more chances in comparison with Native technology to handle a greater quantity of work in an app and to publish higher-functionality updates. The winner in terms of scalability of the Native app vs the Reacts Native app is thus React Native.

A platform-sized experience, which boasts native Android and iOS components while the program runs, is the main advantage React Native offers.
